detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Pocket flaps at the front with a button.

One-shoulder top in woven fabric with one short, wide sleeve and a straight-cut hem.

Blouse in woven fabric with printed stripes. Collar with detachable ties, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Long-sleeved top in airy viscose jersey with a collar and V-neck with buttons at the top. Seam at the waist with ties at the front and elastication at the back, and decorative buttons at the hem. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep neckline and buttons at the front. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long, double-breasted, A-line coat in a recycled wool blend. Oversized notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, flap front pockets, side pockets and high slits in the sides. Lined.
Long skirt in patterned, pleated mesh with an elasticated waist. Jersey underskirt.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted slipover in fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell and wool with hole-embroidered sections, a round neckline, slightly deeper armholes and a roll-edge hem.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery appliqués on the top.
Short, one-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Short, one-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.

Short dress in a striped weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons at the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs with slits. Detachable belt with D-rings at the waist, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Shorter jumper in a fluffy knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shorter jumper in a fluffy knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Elastic strap over the foot and elastic gores in the sides. Satin linings and insoles and soft imitation suede soles.

Tortoiseshell-patterned smartphone case in transparent plastic. Fits iPhones 6 to 8.
